title: Unable to purchase Hextech Mystery Champion Shard
body: I have been noticing for awhile now that I am unable to purchase  Hextech Mystery Champion Shards at 1700 ip, however at some point when my ip is greater than 1700 (can't really say what point that is since I haven't payed enough attention, currently I have 1754 ip and it says not enough)

replies.body:
This may be a syncing issue with the updated client.  Log back into the legacy version to fix it up, then you can return to the updated version!  :D

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

I hope that helps!
